comments:
When I double-click to open a Jira task in my task list, it opens, but not before the plugin throws an exception, and the Comments editor page doesn't appear - only the Planning and Browser pages appear.  

I'm using Eclipse 3.2RC6, and the latest AJDT 3.2 development build.

Here are a couple of stack traces, one for each error in the PDE error log:

Are your repository settings correct in the Task Repositories view?  They get cleared on every Eclipse reinstall.  Also, is this with Mylar 0.2?
Are you still able to reproduce this?
Sorry for not responding sooner.  I cannot reproduce this bug now.  I am using the latest (0.5.2) version of Mylar.  Right now things are working fine for me.
Thanks Larry.  Please reopen if you do see this again.
